name: India
facts: India is the largest democracy, with over 1,600 languages and a rich cultural diversity.

name: Canada
facts: Canada has the longest coastline in the world, measuring over 202,080 kilometers in length.

name: Japan
facts: Japan includes over 6,800 islands, with the largest being Honshu, Hokkaido, Kyushu, and Shikoku.

name: Australia
facts: Australia is a continent-country with unique wildlife, having more kangaroos than people.

name: Brazil
facts: Brazil's Amazon Rainforest is crucial for Earth, producing roughly 20% of our planet’s oxygen.

name: Germany
facts: Germany is famed for engineering and is where Carl Benz created the first automobile in 1885.

name: France
facts: France, home to the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum, is the world’s most visited country.

name: Italy
facts: Italy, home to the Colosseum and Venice, boasts more than 50 UNESCO World Heritage sites.
